author: Alasdair Soussi
title: Don't self-isolate in the Highlands, Scots tell city dwellers
description: With limited amenities in remote locations, Scotland's rural communities are begging visitors to stay away.
content: Glasgow, United Kingdom - With its crisp air and arresting scenery, the Scottish Highlands and Islands have inspired writers, poets and filmmakers - but today many are urging city dwellers to cease travelling to the region in a bid to avoid the coronavirus pa… [+3941 chars]
